predicate.note: Frames file for 'presage' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry.

roleset.name: show the future

example.name: pretty simple, really
example.text: Analysts said the move could presage even harsher action by the banks.
example.arg: even harsher action by the banks

roleset.note: Presage seems to always take a negative-valued arg1.
